title: Daniil Medvedev's Big Comeback in Tennis
summary: Daniil Medvedev is a tennis player from Russia who played in the Australian Open tournament. In one match, he was losing by two sets but fought back to win the next three sets and the whole match. This was exciting because last year, he lost matches even after coming back from being down. He felt nervous but stayed strong. Medvedev has played many long matches at the Australian Open and has won some of them. He also joked with an interviewer after the match. The article talks about his journey to the final and how he handles tough situations.

background_read: Tennis is a popular sport played around the world. In tournaments like the Australian Open, players compete in matches that are divided into sets. Winning a set means scoring enough points, and players need to win more sets than their opponent to win the match. Sometimes, players fall behind but make a comeback, which makes the game exciting. Daniil Medvedev is a professional tennis player known for his skills and determination in tough matches.
